quizDescription: Test your knowledge of movies starring Tom Hanks with this quiz!

questions.question: Which movie stars Tom Hanks as a FedEx executive who becomes stranded on a deserted island?
questions.explanation: 'Cast Away' follows Tom Hanks as Chuck Noland, a man who survives a plane crash and must learn to survive on a remote island.

questions.question: In which movie does Tom Hanks play the role of a prison guard who forms a friendship with an inmate on death row?
questions.explanation: 'The Green Mile,' based on Stephen King's novel, features Tom Hanks as Paul Edgecomb, a compassionate prison guard.

questions.question: Which movie stars Tom Hanks as an astronaut leading a crew on a mission to Mars?
questions.explanation: 'Apollo 13' is based on the true story of the ill-fated 1970 space mission, with Tom Hanks playing astronaut Jim Lovell.

questions.question: Which movie stars Tom Hanks as a man who befriends a young boy, forming a heartwarming friendship?
questions.explanation: 'Big' follows Tom Hanks as a young boy who wishes to be big and wakes up in an adult's body, leading to hilarious and touching moments.

questions.question: In which movie does Tom Hanks portray a lawyer who battles AIDS-related discrimination in the workplace?
questions.explanation: 'Philadelphia' is a groundbreaking film that earned Tom Hanks an Academy Award for his powerful portrayal of Andrew Beckett.
